name: King Khamsa
description:
King Khamsa
Kamsa or Kansa was the tyrant ruler of the Vrishni kingdom with its capital at Mathura. He was the cousin of Devaki, the mother of the god Krishna — who slew Kamsa. Kamsa is described as human in early sources and a asura (demon) in the Puranas.

===

King Khamsa
Raka Jana
2021
